question_title: [Short fuse] What will be the Rotten Tomatoes Rating for "Melania" on February 13th, 2026?
summary: The Melania documentary currently has a 10% Rotten Tomatoes score (2 Fresh / 20 reviews) with overwhelmingly negative critical consensus (Metacritic 7/100). Monte Carlo simulation modeling additional reviews suggests the score will likely drift slightly lower as more negative reviews come in, though it could stay around 10% if few new reviews appear. The Manifold market corroborates expectations of a very low final score (87% probability below 20%). My forecast centers around 8-10% with high confidence the score will remain in single digits to low teens.

factors.description: Current RT score is 10% (2/20 reviews) - strong empirical anchor point
Metacritic 7/100 with 100% negative reviews confirms extreme critical consensus
All major outlets have reviewed; late reviews from smaller outlets may slightly differ
Manifold market median expectation around 10% with 50% probability in 0-10% range
Additional reviews will likely be mostly negative, diluting the score further
